      • joinGroup

        public void joinGroup​(User user)
        When a user wants to join a group, he calls this function. It adds the User to the arrayList "groupUser", adds a user to the number of users of the group and adds a vote to all the projects the group voted.
        Parameters:
        user - that joins the group

      • leaveGroup

        public void leaveGroup​(User user)
        When a user wants to leave a group, he calls this function. It removes the User from the arrayList "groupUser", removes the user from the number of users of the group and removes a vote from all the projects the group voted.
        Parameters:
        user - that leaves the group

      • voteProjectAsGroup

        public void voteProjectAsGroup​(Project project)
        When a group votes a project it calls this function and it adds that project to the ArrayList "groupVote"
        Parameters:
        project - that the group is going to vote

      • affinityReport

        public double affinityReport​(Group group)
        This method returns the affinity report calculated by the following formula: (N12+N21)/(N1+N2). Where N12 are the number projects created by group 1 and supported by group 2; N21, the same but the other way around; and N1 and N2 the number of projects created by group 1 and 2, respectively.
        Parameters:
        group - which is wanted to do the affinity report with

      • update

        public void update​(User u)
        This method checks whether the information of group g is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from group we need to specified it with its parameters
        Parameters:
        u - , the user to be checked

      • update

        public void update​(Project p)
        This method checks whether the information of project p is up to date, depending if we want to add or remove information from group we need to specified it with its parameters
        Parameters:
        p - , the project to be checked
